verses.roman:
śrīman-madana-gopāla-
govindadeva-tuṣṭaye
caitanyārpitam astv etac
caitanya-caritāmṛtam

synonyms: śrīman-madana-gopāla—of the Deity named Śrīman Madana-gopāla; govinda-deva—of the Deity named Govindadeva; tuṣṭaye—for the satisfaction; caitanya-arpitam—offered unto Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; astu—let it be; etat—this; caitanya-caritāmṛtam—the book known as Caitanya-caritāmṛta.
translation: For the satisfaction of Śrī Madana-gopāla and Govindadeva, we pray that this book, Caitanya-caritāmṛta, may be offered to Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
